Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Ankhhapy with plain lappet wig, long plaited beard, arms crossed holding two hoes in relief, seed-bag over left shoulder, uninscribed back-pillar, enclosed horizontal and vertical line T-form of hieroglyphs identifying the deceased as a priest of Ptah and Banebdjed.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Lt-Gen Augustus W H Meyrick
